dcterms:description: A large open-access lung sound database comprising 9,765 audio files of lung sounds (each with a duration of 15 s), 34,095 inhalation labels, 18,349 exhalation labels, 13,883 continuous adventitious sound (CAS) labels (comprising 8,457 wheeze labels, 686 stridor labels, and 4,740 rhonchus labels), and 15,606 discontinuous adventitious sound labels (all of which are crackles).
dcterms:title: HF_Lung_V1

dcterms:creator: Taiwan Society of Emergency and Critical Care Medicine
dcterms:description: A database used in a datathon in Taiwan Smart Emergency and Critical Care (TSECC), 2020, under the license of Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC BY 4.0), which includes lung sound recordings acquired from 261 patients.
dcterms:title: TSECC Database

dcterms:creator: B. Rocha

dcterms:description: The largest reported respiratory sound database as of writing this paper, comprising 6,898 breath cycles and 10,775 events of wheezes and crackles acquired from 126 individuals.
dcterms:title: ICBHI 2017 Challenge
